chapters.title: Chapter 1: The Flame of Tar Valon
chapters.info: Matrim (Mat) Cauthon, p. 7 (6)—A young man from Emond's Field, and a good friend of Rand al'Thor. He likes to gamble, and has considerable luck with random events, such as dice games. When he was traveling from Emond's Field to the Eye of the World, he picked up a dagger from Aridhol, more commonly known as Shadar Logoth, which was tainted with evil. He was partially healed by Moiraine, but the dagger was stolen before his link with it could be completely broken. If it is not broken soon, Mat will waste away and die. See also al'Thor, Rand; Aybara, Perrin.
